channel.title: Just a Question
channel.description: Well i was trying to get my friends comp to crash, so i looked into a bunch of dos commands, im trying to simulate a power cut-off on the computer... does anyone know the command? (im using xp professional sp2 - should that make any difference) the nearest i got was "shutdown -t 00" - but this still saves documents or atleast makes recovery copies, any way to avoid this? :confused: :D

item.title: Just a Question

item.description:

why dont you do it to ure owned computer =]

item.description:

Godamit, what is your problem? Im just kindly asking for a command, and you get all pissed off man? Its not a good friend anyway… and i need to pay him back for some shit he did to me…
[/quote]

Yeah… Kindly asking for a command to fuck someones computer up. Grow up.[/quote]

What the hell is fucking someones computer up by shutting it down?
